name: AudioFileRegionFlags
desc: Flags that specify a playback direction for an AudioFileRegion structure.

items.name: static var loopEnable: AudioFileRegionFlags
items.desc: If set, the region is looped. You must set one or both of the remaining flags must also be set for the region to be looped.

items.name: static var playBackward: AudioFileRegionFlags
items.desc: If set, the region is played backward.

items.name: static var playForward: AudioFileRegionFlags
items.desc: If set, the region is played forward.
